title: Ronald McDonald
summary: Ronald McDonald is a clown character used as the primary mascot of the McDonald's fast-food restaurant chain. In television commercials, he inhabited a fantasy world, McDonaldland, where he had adventures with his friends Mayor McCheese, the Hamburglar, Grimace, Birdie the Early Bird and The Fry Kids. By 2003, the McDonaldland world was dropped from McDonald's advertising, but Ronald continued to appear.[1]
